name: Planetquake
description:
Pilot your ship through a crevasse on a seismically active planet. Made for the LÖVE Jam 2022, which had the theme of "Earthquake".

Unfortunately, there's no music. Why not put on Holst's The Planets or some chip tunes while you play?

Controls

Press W for forward thrust, S for backward thrust, and space for upward thrust. P pauses the game.

Acknowledgements

  • Libraries: Fennel by Calvin Rose and contributors, g3d by groverburger, and Cljlib by  Andrey Listopadov
  • Project template: min-love2d-fennel by Alexander Griffith
  • Font: Orbitron by Matt McInerney
  • Images: Moon texture from g3d*

g3d's included assets were helpful as a starting point.

I created all other assets myself. The explosion and earthquake sound effects were generated using jsfxr and the star field was generated using the GIMP. 

Thank you to the members of the LÖVE Discord for advice and encouragement. :)

*Pablo, the jam's organizer, suggested to me that using a premade image texture is within the spirit of the rules, but I guess it's ultimately up to you, the voter :) For the record, fonts and base code are all specifically exempted from the no premade games and assets rules.

License

Source code licensed under MIT, same as Lua itself. Asset license TBD.
